meanings.definition: To provide someone with a sum of money that is expected to be paid back with interest.
meanings.sent1: The bank loans money to individuals and businesses.
meanings.sent2: She loans her friends money when they are in need.
meanings.sent3: He loans his video games to his younger brother, but always gets them back scratched.
meanings.sent4: Time loans us moments of joy that we should cherish.
meanings.sent5: The sun loans its warmth to the earth every day.
